Author: Decker#3767
Content:
https://github.com/DeckerSU/KomodoOcean/releases/tag/v3.0.0-beta1-9979ca2 - new binaries of Komodo-Qt are available.

This is upcoming hardfork **Obsidian Dragon** compatible version for KMD and assetchains, except assets which actively using CC. Support for CC enabled chains which will have issues with this version of wallet will be added later. You must update your Komodo-Qt to this (or latest) version till `Block #1670000` in KMD and till `12/20/2019 @ 11:06am (UTC)`.

- Obsidian Dragon KMD hardfork compatability (KMD version 0.5.0)
- POS staking algo change.
- Dependencies update: libgmp, libsodium, libsnark, boost.
- Other minor fixes and improvements.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Pinned a message.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: Also, in this version was fixed link errors with boost during build on Debian 10, Ubuntu 19 and few other Linux distros. Issue with deps mentioned here above - also fixed. So, all who wants to build from sources - now should be able to do it.

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
About versioning it's little bit not clear, i'm agree. Internally we have few different version numbers, but common is:

- `3.0.0.0` (CLIENT_VERSION_MAJOR.CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR.CLIENT_VERSION_REVISION.CLIENT_VERSION_BUILD) - this is daemon version, that equals to `v3.0.0-beta1`. And equals `"version": 3000000` from `getinfo` output.
- `0.5.0` - is a KMD version ("KMDversion": "0.5.0").
- `v3.0.0-beta1-9979ca2` - GitHub Tag of current release.

Earlier (from times when Komodo-Qt was available only for Windows) we used different tag versioning, with `-g%VER%-%BUILD%` at the end, now it will be deprecated.
